derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French ciun 'shoot, twig', of unknown origin

entry.tran: (名门望族的)年轻子弟,小少爷
entry.def: A scion of a rich or famous family is one of its younger or more recent members.

example.ex: Nabokov was the scion of an aristocratic family.
